timings.name: Return to CRU for Treatment Period 2

conditions.name: ALT Elevation for Dose Interruption
conditions.description: Alanine aminotransferase (ALT) is greater than 3 times and less than or equal to 5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN).

conditions.name: ALT Elevation for Discontinuation
conditions.description: Alanine aminotransferase (ALT) is greater than 5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN).

conditions.name: Severe Neutropenia
conditions.description: Neutrophil count is less than 1.0 x 10^9/L.

conditions.name: Significant Neutrophil Decrease
conditions.description: Neutrophil count decreases by more than 30% from baseline and is below the reference range.
conditions.text: > 30% ↓ from baseline and Neutrophils below reference range

conditions.name: Potential Liver Injury (Hy's Law)
conditions.description: Bilirubin is greater than 2 times ULN, accompanied by ALT greater than 3 times ULN.
conditions.text: Bilirubin > 2 × ULN Accompanied by ALT > 3 × ULN

conditions.name: Neurologic Worsening
conditions.description: Evidence of neurologic worsening by Adverse Events or by neurologic physical exam assessment.
conditions.text: Evidence of neurologic worsening by AEs or by neurologic physical exam assessment

conditions.name: Psychiatric Worsening
conditions.description: Evidence of clinically significant acute psychiatric worsening which may include but not limited to suicidality, acute depression, or psychosis.
conditions.text: Evidence of clinically significant acute psychiatric worsening

conditions.name: SRC Safety Review for Titration
conditions.description: The Safety Review Committee (SRC) must review available safety data through Day 23 for each participant before dose titration.
conditions.text: SRC will review available safety data through Day 23 for each participant.

transitionRules.name: Screen to Enrollment Transition
transitionRules.text: Participants eligible for the study will be enrolled on Day -7.

transitionRules.name: Dose Titration to 30 mg/day
transitionRules.text: Participants will be administered ALXN1840 at 15 mg/day and then increase to 30 mg/day on Day 29, following SRC safety review.

transitionRules.name: Dose Interruption for ALT Elevation
transitionRules.text: If ALT > 3x ULN and <= 5x ULN, temporarily interrupt dosing. Rechallenge at 15 mg QOD when ALT < 2x ULN.

transitionRules.name: Intervention Discontinuation for ALT Elevation
transitionRules.text: If ALT > 5x ULN, discontinue study intervention.

transitionRules.name: Dose Interruption for Severe Neutropenia
transitionRules.text: If Neutrophils < 1.0 x 10^9/L, temporarily interrupt dosing. Rechallenge at 15 mg QOD when neutrophils > 1.5 x 10^9/L.

transitionRules.name: Dose Reduction for Neutrophil Decrease
transitionRules.text: If Neutrophils decrease > 30% from baseline and are below reference range, reduce dose to previous dose level or to 15 mg QOD.

transitionRules.name: Dose Interruption for Potential Liver Injury
transitionRules.text: If Bilirubin > 2x ULN with ALT > 3x ULN, temporarily interrupt dosing. Rechallenge requires Medical Monitor approval.

transitionRules.name: Dose Modification for Neurologic Worsening
transitionRules.text: Investigator and Alexion Medical Monitor will evaluate the need for dose modification (interruption, increase or decrease) based on neurologic worsening.

transitionRules.name: Intervention Discontinuation Criteria
transitionRules.text: Participants must be considered for discontinuation from study intervention for: Serious hypersensitivity reaction; Severe uncontrolled infection; Use of disallowed medication; Pregnancy or planned pregnancy.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Study Completion
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant is considered to have completed the study if he/she has completed all phases of the study including the last scheduled procedure shown in the Schedule of Activities (SoA).

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Participant Withdrawal
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant may withdraw from the study at any time at his/her own request.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Investigator Discontinuation
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant may be withdrawn at any time at the discretion of the Investigator for safety, behavioral, compliance, or administrative reasons.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Lost to Follow-up
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant will be considered lost to follow-up if he or she repeatedly fails to return for scheduled visits and is unable to be contacted by the study site after multiple attempts.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Sponsor Termination of Study
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Alexion reserves the right to close the study site or terminate the study at any time for any reason at the sole discretion of Alexion.

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Dose Titration Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision point on Day 29 to titrate dose from 15 mg/day to 30 mg/day, contingent on SRC review of safety data through Day 23.

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Dose Modification Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Ongoing decision points throughout the study to modify, interrupt, or discontinue dosing based on safety laboratory results or clinical assessments.
